system.description: You 	have 	an 	exceedingly 	bad Characteristic — lower one which is already –3 or lower by one point. Describe what it is about you that makes this obvious, such as a feeble stature, hideous visage, or slack-jawed stupidity. You may take this Flaw twice for a single Characteristic, lowering it to –5, and multiple times for different Characteristics.
